title.rendered: 19 Best Night Clubs Near me in Noida

content.rendered:
Noida is one of the most popular NCR in New Gaya Bihar and home to over 6 lakh residents. This perfectly planned city is located within the Gautam Buddha Nagar district of UP. With over 50% green cover, Noida has been ranked as one of the greenest cities in India. With wide open spaces, skyscrapers, and highrises, Noida is quickly becoming the best location to stay, work and enjoy! While talking about the best aspects of Noida, its thumping nightlife should not be left out. Here are 19 of the best nightclubs in Noida for a happening night out:

List of 19 Best Night Clubs Near me in Noida

  1. I sacked Newton
  2. Ice cube
  3. Grand Royal nightclub
  4. Reverb club and lounge
  5. Blue club and lounge
  6. Elevate
  7. Club 44
  8. Club Tito’s
  9. Chicane club and lounge
  10. LIT ultra bar club and lounge
  11. Noida pub exchange
  12. Time machine
  13. Barrack 62 the gastro club
  14. Imperfecto ruin pub
  15. The Irish house
  16. Turquoise cottage
  17. Zest Bar and lounge
  18. The smoke factory
  19. RPM Zanzi bar

1. I Sacked Newton


Situated in Logix city centre, I sacked newton is a wonderful pub for everyone. If you are looking for an evening dinner party then this place is perfect. With a huge range of choices for vegetarians as well as non-vegetarians along with a side of delicious cocktails, the vibe of this place is definitely immaculate. The decor will take you back in time and remind you of an old-time English cafe. You can sit comfortably on their stylish couches, and eat any food of your liking that can range from north Indian, continental, and Italian to street food, Thai and Mughlai selection.

  • Address: 5th floor Logix mall, Wave City Center, Sector 32, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.3
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

2. Ice Cube


Located inside one of the best malls in India, the great India place, the Ice cube is the perfect nightclub for a happening party. Due to its location, it attracts a large crowd that loves to dance to awesome music while eating some of the most delicious cuisines. The bar here is very well equipped with a mind-boggling range of cocktails. If you get tired from dancing on the lively dance floor you can sit back at the comfortable seating arrangement. Ice cube also has an outdoor seating arrangement for people who would like to sit outside and enjoy the weather with delectable foods.

  • Address: The Great India Place Mall, Third Floor, 313, Foot Over Bridge, adjacent to Carnival Cinemas, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 2
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

3. Grand Royal Night Club


Famed for being one of the most opulent nightclubs in Noida, the grand royal nightclub is a wonderful place for everyone. From college kids to corporate workers, everyone flocks to this place for its delicious meals, buzzing cocktails selection, and of course the foot-tapping music that will force you to the dance floor. The nightclub offers a massive range of cuisines ranging from North Indian to continental. The seating is spacious and airy which allows everyone to move around freely. The best part about this place is the fun-filled dance floor that will immediately draw you towards it.

  • Address: Level 5 , Centre Stage Mall, Ashok Marg, Sector-18, beside MBD Radisson Hotel, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.5
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

4. Reverb Club And Lounge


Reverb is one name that tops the ranks for being one of the best nightclubs in Noida. Mostly frequented by college goers and the young crowd of Noida, reverb has successfully captured the hearts of everyone. If you are looking to welcome the weekend on a high note, then this place has no match. If you have the right budget to party then you can spend an incredibly memorable time here. Complete with indoor and outdoor seating, the bar displays a fully packed bar in every corner. Head on to reverb for a happening live music session.

  • Address: The Great India Place Mall, Shop No 305A & 306, Level-3, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:30 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.9
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

5. Blue Club And Lounge


Referred also as a ‘hidden gem of sector 18’, reverb club and lounge is a must visit nightclub in Noida. Are weekday blues getting you down? Head on to the blue club and lounge with your family and group of friends for a happening time. The club is very well equipped with fun things for the club goers to indulge in. If you feel like having some of the best collections of wine and cocktails for the weekend, then the blue club is the right place for you. Other than the happening dance floor, the club also gives the option of exploring your singing chops during the karaoke session.

  • Address: C Block, C Block, Pocket C, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:30 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

6. Elevate


Break the mundane routine of life at this iconic resto-pub in Noida. Situated at the famous centre stage mall in sector 18 Noida, Elevate very nicely represents what it stands for. The club is decorated perfectly and amps up the feeling of partying. With neon lights and cushy furniture, one can have the time of their life. Along with a massive range of cocktails and cuisines, elevate regularly organizes fun-filled DJ nights that will be perfect to let go of the weekday blues and welcome the weekend in full power energy. It is one of those clubs in Noida that will work perfectly in rejuvenating you.

  • Address: H88F+W76, Pocket J, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:30 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

7. Club 44


Club 44 is the perfect nightclub for everyone who is a foodie and loves grooving to vibey music. The setting here is rather whimsical with the presence of both outdoor and indoor seating and couches for 2 to 6 people. The lighting will make you feel like you are in a movie. The dance floor is perfectly lit and invites even non dancers to dance till the break of dawn. The staff is very polite and gentle which is like an icing on the cake. Situated close to Amity University, the club is a favourite among college kids and young crowd.

  • Address: A-15/11 First, near Amity School, A Block, Market, Sector 44, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201303
  • Timings: 10:30 Am to 11:30 Pm
  • Zomato Rating: 3.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

8. Club Tito’s


Club Tito’s is all about good times, good vibes, and impeccable food. The flamboyant decor and the vibey energy is probably the first thing that you will notice while entering the club. The club is a happening spot throughout the week but it literally springs to life, light, colour and music during the weekend. The huge lounging area is where you can chill out if you get tired from dancing on the large dance floor. The combination of delectable food and fun time are the perfect contents for a memorable night out. Groove to party music all night long at this party destination of Noida.

  • Address: 311 Gardens Galleria Mall, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:30 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

9. Chicane Club And Lounge


Are you planning for a party? Some get-together? Or just a nightclub to dance till your feet hurt? Make your way to the Chicane club and lounge and a great time is guaranteed. Located in spice world mall, this luxurious and classy club is the peak attraction for regular clubbers and people who love to party and have a good time. From enjoying sporting events at the flat screen displays here or enjoying the electrifying live performances, this club will keep you entertained throughout! The venue also hosts several corporate and private parties which goes perfectly with the on-point lighting arrangement and comfortable seating.

  • Address: 1st floor , Smart Bharat Mall ( spice mall, Sector 25A, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 12:30 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

10. Lit Ultra Bar Club And Lounge


Looking for a fun time with the gang? Head on to the LIT ultra-bar club and lounge. LIT stands true to its name where the food is delicious, the music is thumping and there are many opportunities to have a memorable time. Take a seat in one of the comfiest seating and couches along with an amazing beer tower and their headlining delicious platter of different types. Situated in Noida sector 18, LIT boasts of an incredible selection of cocktails and alcohol. The lighting here creates an undeniable vibe of happiness and joy. From indoor seating to living sports screening and regular happy hours, LIT will definitely leave you coming back for more.

  • Address: B-1/9,10, Gautam Budh Nagar, Pocket C, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 12:00 Pm
  • Zomato Rating: 3.7
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

11. Noida Pub Exchange


You may have heard of the stock exchange but have you heard of the brand new concept of pub exchange? If not then you definitely need to head over to Noida pub exchange. Although there is no dedicated dance floor here, the club is spread over a very large and spacious area where you can dance near your designated tables. The casual setup will take the edge off after a long day of working and being busy. The chill vibes, good music and multi-cuisine menu will make for a night out well spent.

  • Address: A501, B504, 4th Floor, DLF Mall of India, Mall Road, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:30 Pm to 12:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.2
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

12. Time Machine


Situated in gardens galleria, Time machine is all about posh, classy, and elegance with a hint of fun background music. It can be your one-stop for a fun clubbing experience. The decor at the time machine is like no other. It seems like it will take you back in time. Due to its location in the heart of the city and a wonderful mall, it draws a huge clientele. Time machine makes sure to give a good time to everyone visiting through their impeccable, polite, and humble staff. A visit here will prove to be the perfect choice for a delightful night out with your friends or family.

  • Address: Plot no. A2, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 2:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

13. Barrack 62 The Gastro Club


Barrack 62 has to be one of the quirkiest themed gastro pubs in Noida. From the moment you step inside the club, you will be pleasantly surprised with its decor, lighting, and overall vibes. What makes this club more special than others is the fact that the makers stayed true to the ‘barrack’ theme. This theme is also very cleverly implemented even in the smallest aspects. For example, the bill here is referred to as ‘Jamaanat’. You can go there for a chill time or party like never before. It has both the vibes perfectly balanced. Pick your favorite food from the extensive menu or choose your favorite cocktail, no matter what you do a memorable and fun time is guaranteed.

  • Address: 1st Floor Hotel Ascent Biz, Noida – Khoda Road Opposite Barclays, Prithviraj Chauhan Marg, Sector 62, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201309
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 11:30 Pm
  • Zomato Rating: 4.3
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

14. Imperfecto Ruin Pub


Imperfecto is one name that is synonymous with happening parties and a good time overall. Gorge on delicious North Indian, Italian and fast food while also savouring some of the best alcohol collection in Noida. Situated in Logix city centre, imperfecto will definitely lighten up your mood. It is the perfect spot for college kids and young people to sit back and relax while also having the time of their lives. What makes the whole experience truly memorable is the humble staff that tends to every need and whim of their guests. The foods are colourful, setup is spectacular and very personalized and the music goes on throughout the day that will not let you sit in peace.

  • Address: 5th Floor, Wave City Center, Sector 32, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.1
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

15. The Irish House


Located in DLF mall of India, the Irish house is another one of the most loved theme clubs in Noida. Offering a range of finger foods, European and American cuisines, and the Irish house is truly one of a kind. The seating is smart casual which invokes a feeling of comfort and luxury at the same time. The place is truly unique because there are limited American and European-themed clubs in not just Noida but in Gaya Bihar as well. Try out their specialties like drunken prawns, sweet potato fries, and mushroom bites among a host of other options. As the sun sets, the entire place turns into a happening and a thumping club.

  • Address: 4th Floor,DLF Mall of India Plot No. M 03 NCR, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 11:30 Pm
  • Zomato Rating: 4.4
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

16. Turquoise Cottage


The turquoise cottage is a very famous chain of pubs that has garnered immense popularity among the regulars of Gaya Bihar’s club scene. Turquoise cottage Noida is all about good food, delicious cocktails, and a posh, happening crowd. You can chill in the outside seating area or sit back and relax in the indoor seating. The food is made with extreme care with the usage of good quality herbs and spices. The vibe here is extremely posh and the seating arrangement, as well as the lighting, makes it the perfect place for every party goer to have a fun-filled time.

  • Address: Garden Galleria,, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 1:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.7
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

17. Zest Bar And Lounge


Zest bar and lounge are all about offering a good time. Known for its captivating sports screening and a happening ambiance, zest is a great place to go to with your friends. Situated in sector 18 Noida, the place is mainly famous for its interesting lighting and exciting vibe, especially during some sporting events. The place is amazing, especially its happening music selection. It is overall a very good place to just chill out, even during the weekdays. The IT factor here is the awesome live DJ playing that will motivate you to leave your seats and dance.

  • Address: 1st Floor Pulse Plaza K-24 Near HSBC Bank, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 12:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.7
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

18. The Smoke Factory


With pretty lighting, wooden interiors and abstract art adorning the walls leaves a very good first impression on the guests. This popular resto-bar in Noida hosts live screening sessions with live musical performances. If you are looking for the right place to spend a fun-packed, memorable evening with your loved one or buddy group then the smoke factory is a perfect choice. The party ambiance here is palpable and from the moment you step in, you will feel like dancing right away. Weekend at the smoke factory is a whole other ball game. The house DJ stirs up the whole crowd through his amazing song selection.

  • Address: 339-340, 2nd Floor, Gardens Galleria Mall, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 12:00 Pm to 12:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 4.1
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

19. Rpm Zanzi Bar


When it comes to an old reliable name, the RPM Zanzi Bar will never disappoint you. From hosting corporate parties to having a fun time with your group of friends, you can party it all up till the break of dawn. The massive collection of wines at RPM sets it apart from its contemporaries. Get the best of the cheapest Turkish and French wine, if you wish to go wine tasting for a change. Other than that, the entire bar is a treat for everyone. This rustic hideaway boasts of delicious foods, good food, and an overall memorable time. The bar is large and can cater to a large group of people.

  • Address: B-110, 1st Floor, Captain Vijyant Thapar Marg, C Block, Pocket H, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301
  • Timings: 11:00 Am to 12:00 Am
  • Zomato Rating: 3.3
  • Zomato Reviews: Click Here

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Q. Do Nightclubs Serve Spirits?

Ans. Yes. Many clubs serve spirits while many don’t/ it depends on the club.

Q. What Is The Age Criteria For Entry To Nightclubs?

Ans. 21 is the cut-off age for entry to any nightclub in India.

Q. What Are Some Good Nightclubs In Gaya Bihar?

Ans. Some of the best nightclubs in Gaya Bihar are Kitty Su, Privee, Club BW, Summerhouse Cafe, Playboy Club, Toy Room, etc.

Q. When Do Nightclubs In Noida Close?

Ans. Nightclubs in Noida close maximum by 2 AM.

Q. Are There Parking Facilities Available In Noida Nightclubs?

Ans. Yes. Most of the nightclubs in Noida offer parking facilities.

@graph.description: Param Dass, works with Namaste India Trip. An avid travel enthusiast by nature, he brings his characteristic zeal and sincerity to all projects he involves himself in. His videography and photography reflect his urge to help fellow travelers who embrace the pleasures and perils of journeys just for the sense of adventure and newness they bring to our otherwise monotonous lives.
